Download all OSF Project Files

Source: R/osf.R
osf_file_download.Rd

Download all OSF Project Files

Usage

osf_file_download(
  osf_id,
  download_to = ".",
  max_file_size = 1,
  max_download_size = 10,
  max_folder_length = 40,
  ignore_folder_structure = FALSE
)

Arguments

osf_id

an OSF ID or URL

download_to

path to download to

max_file_size

maximum file size to download (in MB) - set to NULL for no restrictions

max_download_size

maximum total size to download (largest files will be omitted until total size is under the limit)

max_folder_length

maximum folder name length

ignore_folder_structure

if TRUE, download all files into a single folder

Value

folder structure

Examples

# \donttest{
  osf_file_download("6nt4v")
#> Starting OSF retrieval for 1 files...
#> * Retrieving info from 6nt4v...
#> ...Main retrieval complete
#> Starting retrieval of children...
#> * Retrieving children for 6nt4v...
#> * Retrieving files for 6nt4v...
#> ...OSF retrieval complete!
# }
